data.title: Burgers and a beer
data.text:
I met friends from work at Fronks. I'd been meaning to try it for a while, but we usually end up going somewhere else up the street from Fronks. What a great place! The burgers were so big, I don't know how I ate that thing. I saw plates of mac and cheese (with great additives), and salads. The beer was great, and happy hour made it even better. 

Service was good, and parking is fairly easy.

data.title: Simply the BEST
data.text: We always enjoy eating at Fronks. Excellent food at a great price. You won't  be sorry. A jewel in the city of Bellflower.

data.title: Over Priced Slop
data.text: The burgers are so over priced the place is located in a sink hole city called Bellflower, they have a Pinto Fairy at the door.... a fat queen beanerkin in skinny jeans... Like wow so original the whole place makes me want to vomit.... Bottom line $15.00 for a hamburger, they got one a lot better around the corner Woodruff & Artesia at Burger King for a third of the cost.  Unless you're an illegal taco and you think this sink hole is nice, which it is probably to you.

data.title: 1st time definitely NOT my last time!!
data.text:
What a great restaurant in Old Town Bellflower!! A group of coworkers and I decided to stop for lunch after a very long meeting!  An absolutely, positively great decision! The restaurant is new, it's clean and the staff is marvelous. They are very attentive yet don't pressure their customers to hurry up and order food or drinks! We asked them to recommend a few of the items on the menu. The staff highly recommended the sweet potato fries. We were so glad that they did! We also had fried avocados and salads and sliders that were perfect! The food is beautifully prepared, beautifully delivered and was absolutely scrumptious!  We are all now addicted to their sweet potato fries!
Two members of our group ordered jalapeño bacon macaroni and cheese and a pulled pork sliders. We all shared our food and with every bite thought "oh I'm going to order that next time!"
Next time can't come soon enough!

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Food was good but I don't know if I'd go without a coupon a bit pricy for burgers and Mac n cheese.  Very big portions too

data.title: Best Comfort Food
data.text:
This place has a great atmosphere, friendly and helpful staff and amazing food. 

You won't be disappointed by the fried pickles, fried corn on the cob or fried avocado. 

Our favorite is the chicken strips with the honey Dijon sauce. 

If you get a salad go for the thousand island dressing. It's great because it has more island!

data.title: Great Burgers!
data.text: Service is fine if you catch them when it isn't too crowded.  Quality beer selection and very good burgers with different styles.

data.title: Burgers & Beer
data.text:
We have dined a few times here and even ate at the original spot on Alondra before they built the new place.  It has a nice decor and service can be spotty.  The best thing about Fronk's is having a burger & beer.  Good portions and quality.  You better be hungry.  The chili is a good side.  Forget the so called BBQ ribs.  They are not BBQ by any stretch of the imagination.  They are grilled!!!  Made the mistake of ordering them once and found out.  I make better ribs myself but it takes 6 hrs.  You can get better ribs at a number of other places like Hambone's.  
They offer a good buffet on Sunday with a great variety.  It is a bit pricey but if you are hungry and can put away the groceries it is worth it then.

data.title: Fun Enviroment! Total Blast!
data.text: My Honey and I love this place.The food is always great..My hubby loves Bull Burger and I love Veggie Burgers..Complimented by my favorite wine and his favorite beer..They have a great variety of craft beers and fine wines.The most important part of this place is the staff. Which consists of grear employees like Tori,Lous, Dan,Ronald.Fronks is truly like going to visit your family and friends.

data.title: Good food but long wait.
data.text: I've been to Fronks twice in the past month; once to celebrate my son's graduation and then for my wife's birthday. The food was good as usual but it seems that the wait times are bordering on the absurd.  For my son's graduation we had a party of 8 so I understand the delay though I did see several staff meandering around instead of cleaning vacated tables.  For my wife's birthday there were 5 of us. Most of the patio was empty (see photo) and two booths were empty inside. We waited a good 25 minutes to get seated at a table that had been empty since we arrived. Not sure what the problem is but there are too many other places around to wait 25 minutes to be seated.

data.title: BBQ Ribs convert
data.text: I have never cared for BBQ Ribs or the BBQ flavor itself. However, I tried the ribs at Fronk's and became an instant convert. I plot and scheme to find a reason to go back for more. Whenever a restaurant offers sweet potato fries, I  order them because they are so good. Nobody has achieved a "10," but I  rated Fronk's a "10+" for sweet potato fries.

data.title: We wanted BBQ... Fronks gave us amazing BBQ!
data.text:
The pork nachos are to die for!!
Pb brownie dessert was overwhelming at first but we demolished it!
My husband had the Buffalo chicken sandwich & loved the fries!

Great service and awesome food!

data.title: Good price for good food
data.text: Really good place with good food. Burgers are nice and juicy and at a good price. 2 people eat for about $40 and its all worth it

data.title: Awesome food! Awesome service!
data.text: I visited fronks on a Sunday afternoon with about six of my family members, there was a shirt wait at the time but less than what they quoted us, the service was quick they kept her drinks full and the entrées are definitely big enough to share. The onion  rings are absolutely delicious, their fried shrimp and fish and chips are amazing! The blue and bacon salad was BOMB! I may have a pretty good beer selection. Including Guinness blonde on tap. I would definitely go again, in fact I can't wait to go again.

data.title: Best burgers
data.text: Must try the Fronken burger,Best burger in town. Its a must if your visiting Bellflower. Also try the pull pork nachos...very yummy

data.title: A great burger joint, and more!
data.text: While in Cerritos from Texas, coworkers suggested this restaurant for lunch, glad I took their recommendation, great restaurant.  Will gladly return on my next visit.  BTW, great employees as well.

data.title: The picture is of old Fronks
data.text: This place has great food.  The service is good and the dishes they added to the menu are great.  There is usually a wait here.

data.title: Excellent burgers! Gourmet!
data.text: We went to Fronk's on a recommendation from friends and were blown away by the food quality. I had a bacon and avocado burger that was excellent! Big and tasty. I also had onion rings which were battered and delicious. I had to try the soup of the day, split pea with ham chunks, really good. Everyone in our party loved the food. Try and park on the street, which is free. The parking lot requires a $4 charge.

data.title: Yummy!
data.text: Great burger and Macaroni & Cheese, but mostly I love the Peanut Butter, Brownie and Ice Cream desert!

data.title: Great burgers
data.text: My husband and kids loved everything they ordered. So did I. Nice and friendly staff, clean environment.
